message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split reflects the fact that you lose value faster than I do in this game.

Alice, I understand your point about the decreasing value. However, your previous offer was too far in your favor. Let's find a compromise that benefits both of us. This offer is more reflective of the time pressure we both face.
Bob, your offer was tempting, but still not equitable. This is my final offer.  If you reject it, you risk getting even less in the subsequent rounds due to the rapid devaluation of your share.
